title: How to tell my project in an interview - Quora

response.answer_text: That is a good question. One of the important factors, is being able to listen to your interviewer. If you block their questions by consistently talking you very well might injure your chances of getting the job. So first, listen to the questions and comments. They may not give you the opportunity. Secondly, make sure you are not blowing any confidential rules, with the company, you did the project with. Can you tell of your project in a summary while not giving up confidential information? Think on these questions. Practice talking of your project. Have a friend or family member listen to you. Another idea is placing it in your cover letter or resume`. It may not be appropriate.
